TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SymmetricAlgorithm extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class SymmetricAlgorithm Implements IDisposable
public ref class SymmetricAlgorithm abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示所有对称算法的实现都必须从中继承的抽象基类。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of symmetric algorithms must inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 类的类使用称为加密块链接（CBC）的链接模式，这种模式需要密钥（）和初始化向量（）来对数据执行加密转换。The classes that derive from the class use a chaining mode called cipher block chaining (CBC), which requires a key () and an initialization vector () to perform cryptographic transformations on data. 若要对使用 类之一加密的数据进行解密，必须将 属性和 属性设置为用于加密的相同值。To decrypt data that was encrypted using one of the classes, you must set the property and the property to the same values that were used for encryption. 为了使对称算法有用，密钥只能由发送方和接收方知道。For a symmetric algorithm to be useful, the secret key must be known only to the sender and the receiver. 、、和 是对称算法的实现。, , , and are implementations of symmetric algorithms. 请注意，使用派生类时，从安全角度来看，这并不是足够的，只是在使用完对象后强制进行垃圾回收。Note that when using derived classes, it is not enough, from a security perspective, to simply force a garbage collection after you have finished using the object. 必须在对象上显式调用 方法，以使对象中的所有敏感数据在释放之前都为零。You must explicitly call the method on the object to zero out any sensitive data within the object before it is released. 请注意，垃圾回收不会使收集对象的内容超出零，只需将内存标记为可用于重新分配。Note that garbage collection does not zero out the contents of collected objects but simply marks the memory as available for reallocation. 因此，垃圾回收对象中包含的数据可能仍存在于未分配的内存中的内存堆中。Thus the data contained within a garbage collected object may still be present in the memory heap in unallocated memory. 对于加密对象，这些数据可能包含敏感信息，例如密钥数据或纯文本块。In the case of cryptographic objects, this data could contain sensitive information such as key data or a block of plain text. 包含敏感数据的 .NET Framework 中的所有加密类都实现了 `Clear` 方法。All cryptographic classes in the .NET Framework that hold sensitive data implement a `Clear` method. 调用时，`Clear` 方法将用零覆盖对象内的所有敏感数据，然后释放该对象，以便可以安全地收集该对象。When called, the `Clear` method overwrites all sensitive data within the object with zeros and then releases the object so that it can be safely garbage collected. 当对象已归零并释放时，应调用 `Dispose` 方法，将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `True`，以释放与该对象关联的所有托管资源和非托管资源。When the object has been zeroed and released, you should then call the `Dispose` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `True` to dispose of all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用具有指定的 属性和初始化向量（）的 类对 `inName`指定的文件进行加密，并将加密的结果输出到 `outName`指定的文件。The following code example uses the class with the specified property and initialization vector () to encrypt a file specified by `inName`, and outputs the encrypted result to the file specified by `outName`. 方法的 `desKey` 和 `desIV` 参数是8字节数组。The `desKey` and `desIV` parameters to the method are 8-byte arrays. 若要运行此示例，必须安装高加密包。You must have the high encryption pack installed to run this example. [!code-cpp[Classic CryptoStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CryptoStream Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CryptoStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CryptoStream Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CryptoStream Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic CryptoStream Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int BlockSize { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property BlockSize As Integer
public: virtual property int BlockSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.BlockSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置加密操作的块大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.
The block size, in bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 块大小是一项操作中可加密或解密的基本数据单位。The block size is the basic unit of data that can be encrypted or decrypted in one operation. 超过块大小的消息将作为连续块处理;小于块大小的消息必须用额外的位填充，以达到块大小。Messages longer than the block size are handled as successive blocks; messages shorter than the block size must be padded with extra bits to reach the size of a block. 有效的块大小取决于使用的对称算法。Valid block sizes are determined by the symmetric algorithm used.

span.span: The block size is invalid.
Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 表示加密操作的块大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Represents the block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 块大小是一项操作中可加密或解密的基本数据单位。The block size is the basic unit of data that can be encrypted or decrypted in one operation. 超过块大小的消息将作为连续块处理;小于块大小的消息必须用额外的位填充，以达到块大小。Messages longer than the block size are handled as successive blocks; messages shorter than the block size must be padded with extra bits to reach the size of a block. 有效的块大小取决于使用的对称算法。Valid block sizes are determined by the symmetric algorithm used. 此字段通过 属性进行访问。This field is accessed through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，使用派生类时，从安全角度来看，这并不是足够的，只是在使用完对象后强制进行垃圾回收。Note that when using derived classes, it is not enough, from a security perspective, to simply force a garbage collection after you have finished using the object. 必须在对象上显式调用 方法，以使对象中的所有敏感数据在释放之前都为零。You must explicitly call the method on the object to zero out any sensitive data within the object before it is released. 请注意，垃圾回收不会使收集对象的内容超出零，只需将内存标记为可用于重新分配。Note that garbage collection does not zero out the contents of collected objects but simply marks the memory as available for reallocation. 因此，垃圾回收对象中包含的数据可能仍存在于未分配的内存中的内存堆中。Thus the data contained within a garbage collected object may still be present in the memory heap in unallocated memory. 对于加密对象，这些数据可能包含敏感信息，例如密钥数据或纯文本块。In the case of cryptographic objects, this data could contain sensitive information such as key data or a block of plain text. 包含敏感数据的 .NET Framework 中的所有加密类都实现了 `Clear` 方法。All cryptographic classes in the .NET Framework that hold sensitive data implement a `Clear` method. 调用时，`Clear` 方法将用零覆盖对象内的所有敏感数据，然后释放该对象，以便可以安全地收集该对象。When called, the `Clear` method overwrites all sensitive data within the object with zeros and then releases the object so that it can be safely garbage collected. 当对象已归零并释放时，应调用 `Dispose` 方法，将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `True`，以释放与该对象关联的所有托管资源和非托管资源。When the object has been zeroed and released, you should then call the `Dispose` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `True` to dispose of all managed and unmanaged resources associated with the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 类的当前实例占用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 `Dispose`后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 `Finalize` 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置针对密码反馈 (CFB) 和输出反馈 (OFB) 密码模式的加密操作的反馈大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the feedback size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation for the Cipher Feedback (CFB) and Output Feedback (OFB) cipher modes.
The feedback size in bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反馈大小决定了回送到连续加密或解密操作的数据量。The feedback size determines the amount of data that is fed back to successive encryption or decryption operations. 反馈大小不能大于块大小。The feedback size cannot be greater than the block size.

span.span: The feedback size is larger than the block size.
Cryptographic Services

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GenerateIV() cil managed

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，生成用于该算法的随机初始化向量 ()。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, generates a random initialization vector () to use for the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，没有理由使用此方法，因为 `CreateEncryptor()` 或 `CreateEncryptor(null, null)` 会自动生成初始化向量和键。In general, there is no reason to use this method, because `CreateEncryptor()` or `CreateEncryptor(null, null)` automatically generates both an initialization vector and a key. 但是，你可能想要使用 方法将对称算法实例与其他初始化向量一起使用。However, you may want to use the method to reuse a symmetric algorithm instance with a different initialization vector.

span.span: Cryptographic Services

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GenerateKey() cil managed

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，生成用于该算法的随机密钥 ()。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, generates a random key () to use for the algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，没有理由使用此方法，因为 `CreateEncryptor()` 或 `CreateEncryptor(null, null)` 会自动生成初始化向量和键。In general, there is no reason to use this method, because `CreateEncryptor()` or `CreateEncryptor(null, null)` automatically generates both an initialization vector and a key. 但是，你可能想要使用 方法将对称算法实例与其他密钥一起使用。However, you may want to use the method to reuse a symmetric algorithm instance with a different key.

summary.span: 获取或设置对称算法的初始化向量 ()。

span.span: Gets or sets the initialization vector () for the symmetric algorithm.
The initialization vector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你创建一个 类的新实例或手动调用 方法时， 属性会自动设置为新的随机值。The property is automatically set to a new random value whenever you create a new instance of one of the classes or when you manually call the method. 属性的大小必须等于 属性除以8。The size of the property must be the same as the property divided by 8. 派生自 类的类使用称为加密块链接（CBC）的链接模式，这需要一个密钥和一个初始化向量来对数据执行加密转换。The classes that derive from the class use a chaining mode called cipher block chaining (CBC), which requires a key and an initialization vector to perform cryptographic transformations on data. 若要对使用 类之一加密的数据进行解密，必须将 属性和 属性设置为用于加密的相同值。To decrypt data that was encrypted using one of the classes, you must set the property and property to the same values that were used for encryption. 对于给定的密钥*k*，不使用初始化向量的简单块密码会将相同的纯文本输入块加密为相同的密码文本输出块。For a given secret key *k*, a simple block cipher that does not use an initialization vector will encrypt the same input block of plain text into the same output block of cipher text. 如果纯文本流中存在重复的块，则密码文本流中会有重复的块。If you have duplicate blocks within your plain text stream, you will have duplicate blocks within your cipher text stream. 如果未经授权的用户知道你的纯文本块的结构，他们可以使用该信息破译已知的密码文本块，并可能恢复你的密钥。If unauthorized users know anything about the structure of a block of your plain text, they can use that information to decipher the known cipher text block and possibly recover your key. 若要对付此问题，请将上一块中的信息混合到对下一个块进行加密的过程中。To combat this problem, information from the previous block is mixed into the process of encrypting the next block. 因此，两个相同的纯文本块的输出是不同的。Thus, the output of two identical plain text blocks is different. 由于此方法使用前面的块对下一个块进行加密，因此需要使用初始化向量来加密第一个数据块。Because this technique uses the previous block to encrypt the next block, an initialization vector is needed to encrypt the first block of data.

exception.span: 试图将初始化向量设置为 。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the initialization vector to .

exception.span: 试图将初始化向量设置为无效大小。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the initialization vector to an invalid size.
Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 表示对称算法的初始化向量 ()。

span.span: Represents the initialization vector () for the symmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段通过 属性进行访问。This field is accessed through the property.

Public Overridable Property Key As Byte()

member this.Key : byte[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对称算法的密钥。

span.span: Gets or sets the secret key for the symmetric algorithm.
The secret key to use for the symmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密钥用于加密和解密。The secret key is used both for encryption and for decryption. 若要成功使用对称算法，密钥必须仅对发送方和接收方是已知的。For a symmetric algorithm to be successful, the secret key must be known only to the sender and the receiver. 有效密钥大小由特定的对称算法实现指定，并在 属性中列出。The valid key sizes are specified by the particular symmetric algorithm implementation and are listed in the property. 如果在使用此属性时 `null` 此属性，则调用 方法来创建新的随机值。If this property is `null` when it is used, the method is called to create a new random value.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the key to .
The key size is invalid.
Cryptographic Services

Public Overridable Property KeySize As Integer

summary.span: 获取或设置对称算法所用密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the secret key used by the symmetric algorithm.

value.span: 对称算法所用密钥的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the secret key used by the symmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效密钥大小由特定的对称算法实现指定，并在 属性中列出。The valid key sizes are specified by the particular symmetric algorithm implementation and are listed in the property. 更改 `KeySize` 值将重置密钥并生成一个新的随机密钥。Changing the `KeySize` value resets the key and generates a new random key. 每当调用 `KeySize` 属性 setter 时（包括分配相同的值时），就会发生这种情况。This happens whenever the `KeySize` property setter is invoked (including when it's assigned the same value).

span.span: The key size is not valid.

summary.span: 获取或设置对称算法中使用的填充模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding mode used in the symmetric algorithm.

value.span: 对称算法中使用的填充模式。

span.span: The padding mode used in the symmetric algorithm.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数纯文本消息不包含完全填充块的多个字节。Most plain text messages do not consist of a number of bytes that completely fill blocks. 通常，没有足够的字节来填充最后一个块。Often, there are not enough bytes to fill the last block. 发生这种情况时，会将填充字符串添加到文本中。When this happens, a padding string is added to the text. 例如，如果块长度为64位，而最后一个块只包含40位，则会添加24位填充。For example, if the block length is 64 bits and the last block contains only 40 bits, 24 bits of padding are added. 有关特定模式的说明，请参阅 枚举。See the enumeration for a description of specific modes.

exception.span: 该填充模式不是 值之一。

span.span: The padding mode is not one of the values.
Cryptographic Services

summary.span: 表示对称算法中使用的填充模式。

span.span: Represents the padding mode used in the symmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数纯文本消息不包含完全填充块的多个字节。Most plain text messages do not consist of a number of bytes that completely fill blocks. 通常，没有足够的字节来填充最后一个块。Often, there are not enough bytes to fill the last block. 发生这种情况时，会将填充字符串添加到文本中。When this happens, a padding string is added to the text. 例如，如果块长度为64位，而最后一个块只包含40位，则会添加24位填充。For example, if the block length is 64 bits and the last block contains only 40 bits, 24 bits of padding are added. 有关特定模式的说明，请参阅 枚举。See the enumeration for a description of specific modes. 此字段通过 属性进行访问。This field is accessed through the property.
